role.argrole: thing arg1 is let go to do

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 绝对)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 要) (VP (VV 放任) (NP-OBJ (PN 自己)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 陷到) (LCP-OBJ (NP (CP-APP (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 情绪)) (VP (VA 低落))) (DEC 的)) (NP (NN 陷阱))) (LC 里))))))))
example.arg: *PRO* 陷到 情绪 低落 的 陷阱 里
